pageContext.claim: “We are putting our steelworkers back to work at a level that nobody thought possible....right here in Indiana, Steel Dynamics has just announced a $75 million investment in Columbia City and a $400 million investment in Terre Haute. You know that, right? It's a lot of money. And just three months ago, United States Steel announced a $750 million investment in a place called Gary, Indiana.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump cites a number of specific investments but the announcements of the companies indicate that a total of 33 jobs would be created (the Steel Dynamics expansion). Most of these investments are intended to achieve greater efficiencies.
